name: Chort Devil
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered
languages: Celestial, Common, Draconic, Infernal, Primordial; telepathy (120 ft.)

trait.name: Devil's Sight
text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The chort devil's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The chort devil can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: blur, magic circle, teleportation
1/day each: dispel magic, dominate person, flame strike, haste

action.name: Multiattack
text: The chort devil makes three melee attacks with its flaming ranseur, or three melee attacks with its claws.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d4 + 7) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Charisma damage.

action.name: Flaming Ranseur
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (1d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

action.name: Devilish Weapons
text: Any weapons wielded by a chort devil do 10 (3d6) fire damage in addition to their normal weapon damage.
